original_text: Then he summoned Moses and Aaron by night and said, “Up, go out from among my people, both you and the people of Israel; and go, serve the Lord, as you have said.
korean_text: 밤에 바로가 모세와 아론을 불러서 이르되 너희와 이스라엘 자손은 일어나 내 백성 가운데에서 떠나 너희의 말대로 가서 여호와를 섬기며

sentences.original_text: Then he summoned Moses and Aaron by night
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 그는 밤에 모세와 아론을 불렀고

sentences.original_text: and said, “Up, go out from among my people,
both you and the people of Israel;
